attributes.action: MAKE THE NEW CAR TAX RULES APPLY TO ALL MOTOR VECHICLES WHAT EVER THERE AGE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HI MY CAR IS OLD, I WILL NEVER BE ABLE TO AFFORD A NEW ONE, BUT I RUN ON VEG OIL WITH A WATER FOR GAS SYSTEM,WHICH MAKES MY CO2 UNDER 100 (g/km) BUT SINCE THIS NEW FASCIST TAX LAW HAS COME IN I HAVE HAD TO PAY FOR MY TAX YET I DO MY UP MOST TO BE GREEN, AND WHAT DO I GET FOR IT VICTIMISED

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
